targets.query:
from(bucket: "BAACTW02")
  |> range(start: -30m, stop: now())  // แสดงข้อมูล ณ เวลา ปัจจุบับ ย้อน ไป 1 นาที่
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> limit(n:1000, offset: 0)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "BAACTW02")
  |> range(start: -15s, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ActRelay1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value"  or(r["_field"] == "value" and r["_value"] != "0.5"))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> limit(n:1, offset: 0)
  |> yield(name: "last")
